data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Analyst / Investor Meet - Intimation
data.news_body: We are submitting herewith Intimation of Conference Call scheduled to be held on February 14 2026 at 14:00 P.M. IST in respect of the Un-audited financial results of the Company for the quarter and nine month ended December 31 2025.

data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for Consideration Of Un-Audited Financial Results For The Quarter And Nine Months Ended December 31 2025 And Any Other Businesses.
data.news_body: Shakti Pumps India Ltd-has informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 13/02/2026 inter alia to consider and approve Financial Results of the Company for the quarter and nine months ended December 31 2025 along with Limited Review Report and any other businesses.

data.caption: Announcement Under Regulation 30 Of SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulation 2015 Regarding ESG Rating
data.news_body: We hereby inform that SES ESG Research Private Limited issued an ESG Report on our Company. The overall ESG score has increased from 60.7 in FY 2023-24  to 67.6 in FY 2024-25.

data.caption: Report On Transfer Request Of Physical Shares Re-Lodged Under The Special Window.
data.news_body: We are submitting herewith Report on Transfer Request of Physical Shares re-lodged under Special Window for the period from December 01 2025 to January 06 2026.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Acquisition
data.news_body: We are  hereby informing that Company has invested Rs. 75.00 Crores in its wholly owned subsidiary i.e. Shakti Energy Solutions Limited.

data.caption: Intimation Under Regulation 30 Of SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015 - Press Release On Maiden Order Received From Karnataka Under The PM KUSUM B Scheme.
data.news_body: We are submitting herewith Press Release regarding the maiden order received from Karnataka Under PM KUSUM B Scheme of Rs. 654.03 Crores (inclusive of GST).

data.descriptor: Award of Order / Receipt of Order
data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Award_of_Order_Receipt_of_Order
data.news_body: We glad to inform that Company has received 1st Letter of Award from Karnataka Renewable Energy Development Limited for 16780 Standalone Off-Grid DC Solar Photovoltaic Water Pumping Systems (SPWPS) pumps. The total value of 16780 pumps is around Rs.654.03 (inclusive of GST).

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Acquisition
data.news_body: We are hereby informing you that Company has invested Rs.3 Crores in it wholly owned subsidiary i.e. Shakti Energy Solutions Limited.

data.descriptor: Certificate under Reg. 74 (5) of SEBI (DP) Regulations 2018
data.caption: Compliances-Certificate under Reg. 74 (5) of SEBI (DP) Regulations 2018
data.news_body: We are submitting herewith Certificate under Reg. 74 (5) of SEBI (Depository and Participants) Regulations 2018 for the quarter ended December 31 2025.

data.descriptor: Award of Order / Receipt of Order
data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Award_of_Order_Receipt_of_Order
data.news_body: We glad to inform that Company has received work order from Haryana Renewable Energy Department (HAREDA) for 792 Solar Water Pumping Systems (SWPS) pumps under Component-B of PM-KUSUM Scheme. The total value of work order is around Rs. 23.54 Crores (inclusive of GST).

data.descriptor: Award of Order / Receipt of Order
data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Award_of_Order_Receipt_of_Order
data.news_body: We glad to inform that Company has  further received new work order from Madhya Pradesh Urja Vikas Nigam Limited for 1952 stand-alone off grid DC Solar Photovoltaic Water Pumping Systems (SPWPS) pumps under Component B of PM KUSUM Scheme. The total value of work order is around Rs. 67.32 Crores (inclusive of GST).

data.descriptor: Award of Order / Receipt of Order
data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Award_of_Order_Receipt_of_Order
data.news_body: We glad to inform that Company has received New Work Order from Madhya Pradesh Urja Vikas Nigam for 4840 Stand-alone Off-Grid DC Solar Photovoltaic Water Pumping Systems (SPWPS) pumps under Component- B of PM-KUSUM Scheme. The total value of work order is around Rs. 170.25 Crores (inclusive of GST).

data.descriptor: Award of Order / Receipt of Order
data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Award_of_Order_Receipt_of_Order
data.news_body: We glad to inform you that Company has received a work order from Jharkhand Renewable Energy  Development Agency for 1000 Nos. of stand-alone off grid Solar Photovoltaic Water Pumping System (SPWPS) Pumps under Component- B of PM- KUSUM Scheme. The total value of work order is around Rs. 21.00 Crores (inclusive of GST).

data.caption: Closure of Trading Window
data.news_body: We hereby inform regarding Closure of Trading Window pursuant to SEBI( Prohibition of Insider Trading) Regulation 2015 that It shall remain close for all Designated Person and their immediate relatives from January 01  2026 till 48 hours after the declaration of Un-audited Financial Results for the quarter ended December 31 2025.

data.descriptor: Award of Order / Receipt of Order
data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Award_of_Order_Receipt_of_Order
data.news_body: We glad to inform you that Company has received Work Order from Madhya Pradesh Urja Vikas Nigam Limited for 1897 Standalone Off Grid DC Solar Photovaltaic Water Pumping Systems Pumps under Component-B of PM-Kusum Scheme. The total value of 1897 pumps is around Rs.65.20 Crores (inclusive of GST).

data.caption: Intimation Under Regulation 30 Of SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015 - Press Release On Empanelment With MSEDCL Under The Magel Tyala Saur Krushi Pump Yojana / PM KUSUM B Scheme.
data.news_body: We would like inform regarding the Press Release on Empanelment with MSEDCL under the Magel Tyala Saur Krushi Pump Yojana/ PM KUSUM B Scheme.

data.descriptor: Award of Order / Receipt of Order
data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Award_of_Order_Receipt_of_Order
data.news_body: We are glad to inform you that Company has received Letter of Empanelment/Award from Maharashtra State Electricity Distribution Company Limited for 12883 Off-Grid DC Solar Photovaltaic Water Pumping System (SPWPS) Pumps under Magel Tyala Saur Krishi Pump Yojana/ PM Kusum B Scheme. The total value of 12883 pumps is around Rs. 356.77 Crores (inclusive of GST).

data.descriptor: Award of Order / Receipt of Order
data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Award_of_Order_Receipt_of_Order
data.news_body: We would like to inform you that Company has received a Work Order from Madhya Pradesh Urja Vikas Nigam Limited for 2033 Stand-alone Off-Grid DC Solar Photovoltaic Water Pumping System (SPWPS) pumps under PM Kusum Scheme. The total value of order is around Rs.71.25 Crores (inclusive of GST).

data.descriptor: Award of Order / Receipt of Order
data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Award_of_Order_Receipt_of_Order
data.news_body: We would like to inform you that Company has received second order from State of Jharkhand. Jharkhand Renewable Energy Development Agency has given Letter of Award for 1200 Nos. of Solar Water Pumping System under PM Kusum Scheme. The total amount of order value is for around Rs.23.98 Crores (inclusive of GST).

data.descriptor: Award of Order / Receipt of Order

data.news_body: We are glad to inform that Company has received Letter of Empanelment from Maharashtra State Electricity Distribution Company Limited for 16025 Off Grid DC Solar Photovoltaic Water Pumps. The total value of 16025 pumps is around Rs.443.78 Crores (inclusive of GST).

data.caption: Intimation Under Regulation 30 Of SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 For Re-Constitution Of Audit Committee.
data.news_body: We would like to inform you that Board of Directors have re-constituted the Audit Committee through resolution passed by circulation on December 10 2025.

data.caption: Intimation Under Regulation 30 Of SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015 Regarding Highest Contribution In Guinness World Record Achievement.
data.news_body: We are glad to inform you that Company has emerged as the leading contributor with 8846 solar water pumps the highest number by any participating company in Guinness World Record achievement under Magel Tyala Solar Pump Yojana.

data.caption: Outcome Of The Board Meeting Of The Company Held On May 05, 2023
data.news_body:
With reference to the subject cited above and Pursuant to Regulation 30 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we hereby inform that the Board of Directors of Shakti Pumps (India) Limited at its Meeting held today i.e. Friday, May 05, 2023 through video conferencing have inter-alia transacted the following business: -

1. Approved the Audited Consolidated and Standalone Financial Results of the Company for the quarter and financial year ended March 31, 2023, along with Auditor's Report.

2. Recommended final dividend of Rs. 2/- per Equity Shares of face value of Rs. 10/each (i.e.20%) for the financial year ended March 31, 2023 subject to approval of Shareholders in the ensuing Annual General Meeting (AGM) of the Company.

data.caption: 1. Approved Audited Financial Results (Both Standalone And Consolidated) Along With Audit Report For The Quarter And Year Ended March 31, 2021.
data.news_body:
With reference to the above subject, this is to inform you that the Meeting of Board of Directors of Shakti Pumps (India) Limited held today i.e. 17th May, 2021, the Board has taken inter-alia, the following decision: -

1. Approved Audited Financial Results (both Standalone and consolidated) along with Audit Report for the quarter and year ended March 31, 2021.

2. The Board has recommended dividend of Rs. 8/- Per Equity Shares of face value of Rs. 10/- (i.e. 80%) for the year ended 31st March 2021, subject to approval of Shareholders in the ensuing Annual General Meeting (AGM) of the Company.

data.caption: Outcome Of Board Meeting.
data.news_body:
With reference to the above subject, this is to inform you that the Meeting of Board of Directors of Shakti Pumps (India) Limited held today i.e. 17th May, 2021, the Board has taken inter-alia, the following decision: -

1. Approved Audited Financial Results (both Standalone and consolidated) along with Audit Report for the quarter and year ended March 31, 2021.

2. The Board has recommended dividend of Rs. 8/- Per Equity Shares of face value of Rs. 10/- (i.e. 80%) for the year ended 31st March 2021, subject to approval of Shareholders in the ensuing Annual General Meeting (AGM) of the Company.
